dcterms:description: The publicly available TrackML Challenge dataset provides 10000 events to emulate the HL-LHC conditions. It has become a benchmark dataset for researchers after the conclusion of the challenge and allows comparisons across different methods.
dcterms:title: TrackML Challenge dataset

dcterms:description: HEP.TrkX is a project that focuses on novel deep learning methods for track reconstruction, providing a dataset that allows for the evaluation of different algorithms in high energy physics.
dcterms:title: HEP.TrkX
